name: Pinball Puzzle: Goal Action
description:
Fingers? Check. Flippers? Check. That's all you'll need to reach the hole in the map.

Tap tap and tap your fingers away at the right timing to control the flippers and toss the ball around. Watch as the ball bumps into tricky obstacles, and plan your next move to plunge it right to the goal! Aim your ball to the hole and unlock more upcoming levels!

Toss us some suggestions via info@alegrium.com
